definition: the style of a particular artist or school or movement
details:
noun
- the style of a particular artist or school or movement
= example: the style of a particular artist or school or movement
= synonyms: artistic style
- a manner of speaking that is natural to native speakers of a language
= synonyms: parlance
- an expression whose meaning cannot be inferred from the meanings of the words that make it up
= example: an expression whose meaning cannot be inferred from the meanings of the words that make it up
= synonyms: idiomatic expression, phrasal idiom, set phrase, phrase
- the usage or vocabulary that is characteristic of a specific group of people
= synonyms: accent, dialect
